CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 28, 1953, pg. 16, reads: "Central Fetes Rev. Talley - Dr. Cornell E. Talley was honored by members and friends at Central Baptist Church Friday, March 20, for having been elected president of the Pennsylvania Baptist State Convention. With him here is his family.  Left to right: the Rev. Mr. Talley, Marsha, his daughter; Cornell E. the third, George Byron, and Mrs. Martha Talley, his wife.  The affair was sponsored by the church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Talley family, from left: Rev. Cornell E. Talley, Marsha, Cornell E. Talley III, George Byron, and Martha Talley, posed behind table with book shaped cake, in honor of Talley's election to president of Pennsylvania Baptist State Convention, Central Baptist Church
